      • addProduct

        public static Product addProduct(java.lang.String name,
                                 ItemType type,
                                 java.lang.String manuf)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                 java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Adds a new product to the database and product line.

        New products are added to the PRODUCT table.

        Parameters:
        name - the new product's name
        type - the new product's type
        manuf - the new product's manufacturer
        Returns:
        the created product
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the database couldn't perform the operation
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - 'name' is null or empty, 'type' is null, or 'manuf' is empty or less than three chars
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - there is no connection to the database

      • recordProduction

        public static java.util.List<ProductionRecord> recordProduction(Product prod,
                                                                java.lang.Integer qnty,
                                                                java.sql.Timestamp time,
                                                                Employee user)
                                                         throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                                                java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                                java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Records the production of a product to the database.

        Production records are added to the PRODSRECORD table.

        Parameters:
        prod - the product being produced
        qnty - the quantity being produced
        time - the time of the production
        user - the user recording this production
        Returns:
        an array of production records created
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the database could not perform the operation
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - 'prod' is null or 'qnty' is null or less than one
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - there is no connection to the database

      • registerUser

        public static Employee registerUser(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.String password)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                    java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Registers a new employee to be able to use the production line tracker.
        Parameters:
        name - the first and last name, separated by a space
        password - the password, containing an upper, lower, and special character
        Returns:
        the employee's credentials
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the database could not perform the operation
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the employee credentials were invald
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - there is no connection to the database

      • getMaxProdId

        private static int getMaxProdId()
                         throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Gets the maximum product id present in the database's PRODUCT table.

        This represents the most recently added product.

        Returns:
        the maximum product id if any products exist, else zero
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - there is no connection to the database

      • getMaxProdsNum

        private static int getMaxProdsNum()
                           throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Gets the maximum production number present in the database's PRODSRECORD table.

        This represents the most recently added production record.

        Returns:
        the maximum production number if any records exist, else zero
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - there is no connection to the database

                             throws java.lang.IllegalStateException

        This represents the most recently added employee.

        Returns:
        the maximum employee id if any employees exist, else zero
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - there is no connection to the database

                         throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Gets the production count for a specified product.
        Parameters:
        prodId - the product's id
        Returns:
        the number of production records that exist for this product if it exists, else zero
        Throws:

      • genSerialNum

        public static java.lang.String genSerialNum(java.lang.String manuf,
                                            ItemType type,
                                            int prodsCount)
        Generates a serial number using the given properties.

        The serial number is composed of the first three letters of the manufacturer's name, followed by the item type's two-letter code, and finally a five-digit id-specific production count.

        Parameters:
        manuf - a product's manufacturer name
        type - a product's item type
        prodsCount - the production count of a specific product
        Returns:
        the serial number

        Parameters:
        string - the string to be reversed
        Returns:
        the reversed string
